name: react-native-modal-dropdown-extender
description: This is a simple fork of the library https://github.com/Kishanjvaghela/react-native-modal-dropdown (A react-native dropdown/picker/selector component for both Android & iOS.) that includes some extra props used to have more control over the rendering style of the drop down component
author: sohobloo <sohobloo@live.cn> (https://github.com/terceramayor)
